action.action-desc: Mr. Meeks introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require issuers to disclose in an annual report any substantial financial relationship with any manufacturer or dealer of firearms or ammunition.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Investor Choice Against Gun Proliferation Act.

section.header: Disclosure of substantial financial relationship with any manufacturer or dealer of firearms or ammunition
section.text: Section 13 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78m) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Disclosure of substantial financial relationship with manufacturer or dealer of firearms or ammunition
subsection.text: Each issuer required to file an annual or quarterly report under subsection (a) shall annually disclose in such a report any substantial financial relationship such issuer has with any manufacturer or dealer of firearms or ammunition.
